titleStmt.title: Sal Scylla: or, A letter written from Scilly to Mr John Goodwin, minister of the gospel in London.
titleStmt.author: Salter, Christopher.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. for Henry Cripps, and Lodowick Lloyd, and are to be sold at their shop in Popes-head Alley.,

notesStmt.note: Signed on p. 8: Christopher Salter, Chyrurgion of the islands and garrison of Scylly.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
